note.string: 1 to 2 attempts. Verified up to stage 10. {P/Kitsune of Eternity Tamamo-no-Mae} needs to be 6★.

note_jp.string: 1〜2回の挑戦。ステージ10まで検証済み。{P/Kitsune of Eternity Tamamo-no-Mae}は6★のみで可。

note_kr.string: 1~2회 시도. 스테이지 10까지 검증됨. {P/Kitsune of Eternity Tamamo-no-Mae}는 6★만 있으면 됨.

note_zh.string: 1至2次尝试。已验证至第10关。{P/Kitsune of Eternity Tamamo-no-Mae}只需6★。
